=== Natty Merges ===

The plan:
* Grab Debian 4.5 packging:  git clone git://git.debian.org/pkg-kde/kde-sc/<package>.git;    cd <dir>; git checkout remotes/origin/kde4.5
* Grab 4.5.2 packaging from bzr
* Merge.  Test.  Upload to Natty and bzr
* For each package inform Debian KDE-Qt team of any patches and packaging delta which may be relevant
* For each package ensure all possible patches are upstream.
* If it can't go upstream inform upstream of patch's existance (if we haven't already done so).

* Wait Lex to upload
